description: This file defines an Android activity named AboutActivity, which displays information about the app such as its name, description, version, and navigation options to privacy policy and licenses screens. It sets up the user interface, handles toolbar actions, and initiates navigation to other activities.

classes.name: AboutActivity
classes.description: An Android activity that displays app information, including name, description, version, and navigation options.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets layout, configures toolbar, populates app info, and sets click listeners for navigation.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates menu options from resource file for the activity.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections, including navigating to settings.
